name: Apartment Viewer Demo
description:
I made this simple demo in 7 days as part of a job application test for EnvisionVR, a business specialising in architectural simulations for real-estate. The demo lets you view an apartment block by panning, zooming and rotating, as well as click on different apartments to view their details such as cost and features.

All code is written by me, and I also made the 2D graphics for apartment features and button prompts. All other assets were provided to me by EnvisionVR as part of the test.

Github repository link: https://github.com/CptnFabulous/Marcus-Mouyat-s-EnvisionVR-Code-Test
